---
title: "Clinical Trial Survival Analysis"
---

```{r}
library(survival)
library(survminer)

# Simulate survival data
set.seed(123)
n <- 200
time <- rexp(n, rate = 0.1)
status <- rbinom(n, 1, 0.7)
group <- sample(c("Treatment", "Control"), n, replace = TRUE)

surv_object <- Surv(time, status)
fit <- survfit(surv_object ~ group)

ggsurvplot(fit, data=data.frame(time,status,group),
           pval=TRUE, risk.table=TRUE)
